name: The Fool
meaning_up: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit

name: The High Priestess
meaning_up: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, mystery
meaning_rev: Secrets, withdrawal, silence, lack of intuition

name: The Emperor
meaning_rev: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline

name: The Hierophant
meaning_up: Spiritual wisdom, tradition, conformity, morality, ethics
meaning_rev: Rebellion, personal beliefs, freedom, challenging tradition

name: The Lovers
meaning_up: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
meaning_rev: Self-love, imbalance, disharmony, misalignment of values

name: The Wheel of Fortune
meaning_up: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
meaning_rev: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

name: The Justice
meaning_up: Justice, fairness, truth, law, cause and effect

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_up: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives

name: The Death
meaning_rev: Resistance to change, fear of new beginnings

name: The Temperance
meaning_rev: Imbalance, excess, lack of long-term vision

name: The Tower
meaning_up: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening

name: The Sun
meaning_rev: Inner child, feeling down, lack of success

name: The Judgement
meaning_rev: Self-doubt, ignoring inner calling, lack of self-awareness
